name: The Galaxy Drinks Cabinet
description: The mesmerising Galaxy is a tall drinks cabinet that will dazzle the eye and demonstrates the sublime capabilities of 21st century design. With its breath-taking hand carved liquid bronze panels set proudly within a smart timber casing, the cabinet is a leading example of British craftsmanship. The cabinet stands on four stylish tapered legs and opens with a pair of neat antiqued brushed brass handles to reveal an interior in satin natural sycamore. Downlighters within cast a warm ambient glow with bevelled glass shelving, a pull out drinks serving tray and antiqued mirrored backboards for an extra touch of modern elegance. There is plenty of storage and compartments inside the Galaxy for storing cocktail glasses, tumblers, a cocktail shaker and bottles. For any specific requirements, a customisation service is also available.
